The AFL: CIO, a major labor union, supports the USMCA trade deal.
Some major environmental organizations: including the Sierra Club, the League of Conservation Voters, and Greenpeace, oppose the USMCA and have urged Congress to vote against it.
Not all major environmental groups have: such as the Environmental Working Group and the Union of Concerned Scientists.
The USMCA was passed by the House of Rep: but Senator Bernie Sanders voted against it due to concerns about its lack of provisions for climate change.
